description:
Do you have a great idea for a website but struggle with the technical side of getting your presence online?

I know how difficult it can be, as I once also struggled with even the simplest tasks and felt like a complete techno-phobe.

Now you can get the help you need.

The Creating Your Internet Presence Course takes you through the process of getting a domain name, hosting your website and using WordPress to manage your site and content.

  • Learn how to get your presence noticed on the internet by using a combination of keywords, text articles, images, video content and social networking.
  • Resources include both free and paid recommendations on marketing and managing your website.
  • This course is designed to build your skills at your own pace and ongoing communication with me regarding any questions you may have.
  • Structured in a way that will take you from little or no knowledge at all or jump in at any level you need.
  • Practice materials are included with this course as downloads either direct from here or from external websites.
  • By taking this course in easy to manage steps, you will find that you can easily complete the training in as little as 48 hours.

By taking this course today, you will go through the process of getting online with the minimum of fuss and with clear explanations to why you need to do what is covered in our detailed tutorial videos.

Be assured that what is taught here is regularly kept up to date and expanded based on our studentâ€™s feedback and questions.

Check out the course curriculum below and see how easily you can build your online presence from the ground up.

Take this course to get you started on your journey with real life experience from an active internet marketer.
title: Creating Your Online Presence
